message: I'll take the lion's share, but I'm feeling generous.  This is a chance for you to get something, but be warned, if you reject this, things might get tougher for you in the future rounds!
Alice, let's be fair and split this evenly. 50/50 is the most straightforward and equitable solution.
I'm still feeling generous, but I won't be as generous as last time.  Think about it carefully, Bob. This is your chance to get something before things get really difficult!
Alice, I'm willing to be flexible, but I need a reasonable deal. This offer recognizes your initial advantage while ensuring I receive a fair share.
Bob, I'm running out of patience. You're making this harder than it needs to be.  Take this offer, or prepare to get nothing at all.
Alice, we're running out of time. This is my final offer, it's a fair compromise to avoid getting nothing. Let's be sensible.
Bob, this is it. You're leaving me no choice. Take this or get nothing.  This is your last chance.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm giving you a slightly better deal than before. Take it or we both lose EVERYTHING.
Bob, you're leaving me no choice. You've rejected everything I've offered, so now I'm taking the majority.  This is your final chance to get anything at all.
Alice, this is insane! We're about to lose a million dollars. I'm offering you more than half. Don't be greedy, let's both walk away with something!

Bob, I'm tired of this game. You've been unreasonable, and I'm not going to let you get away with it. This is my final offer. Take it or get nothing. We both have to live with the consequences of our actions.
